title: White Sands National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         NPS Photo  News Stay connected with White Sands and get information on current events.        Copyright Christian Widebeck  Photos & Multimedia Browse photos, watch vidcasts, and listen to audio podcasts.        NPS Photo  History & Culture The human story of White Sands and the Tularosa Basin spans more than 12,000 years.        NPS Photo  Nature Often called the Galapagos of North America, White Sands is home to a wide variety of plants and animals that have adapted to live in this harsh environment.        NPS Photo  Education Whether your class is visiting the park in person or online, or if you'd like a ranger to come to  your classroom, there are unique opportunities for learning and adventure for your students.        NPS Photo  Kids & Youth Explore online activities or become a WebRanger and learn about activities in the park for kids of all ages.        NPS Photo  Management Learn about the laws and policies that apply to White Sands, the staff that manage the park, and get details about park projects and other management documents.        NPS Photo  Bookstore The Western National Park Association promotes the preservation of White Sands National Monument through its educational bookstore, the publication of books, and funding provided to White Sands through membership and sales of educational materials to visitors.
